description:
Usopp spreads word of Kuro`s evil plot and the impending pirate attack, but no one believes his warnings. The Straw Hat Pirates decide to help Usopp put a stop to the dastardly scheme.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Expose the Plot! Pirate Butler, Captain Kuro!
Inbou o Abake! Kaizoku Shitsushi Captain Kuro
Un plan machiavélique ! Le Capitaine Kuro
¡Destapando la conspiración! ¡El mayordomo pirata, capitán Kuro!
اكشفوا المخطّط! الخادم القرصان القبطان كورو!
การวางแผนถูกเปิดโปง! พี่เลี้ยงโจรสลัด! กัปตันคุโระ!
揭发阴谋！海贼管家克洛船长
陰謀を暴け! 海賊執事キャプテンクロ
